javadoc: ChangeMap facilitates the decoding of change-data to determine if a specific buffer was modified by the corresponding buffer file version. @see ChangeMapFile

methods.javadoc:
Get the underlying change map data as a byte array
@return change map data
methods.name: getData
methods.comment: Get the underlying change map data as a byte array

methods.name: hasChanged
methods.comment:
Returns true if the change map data indicates that the 
 specified buffer has been modified.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the specified index is within the bounds of this map.
methods.name: containsIndex
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified index is within the bounds of this map.

name: ChangeMap
comment:
ChangeMap facilitates the decoding of change-data 
 to determine if a specific buffer was modified by the 
 corresponding buffer file version.
